products.brandedName: Rabanne - Metallic Open-knit Maxi Dress - Silver
products.unbrandedName: Rabanne - Metallic Open-knit Maxi Dress - Silver
products.description: Rabanne Creative Director Julien Dossena takes an avant-garde approach to design, which results in such fresh and unexpected collections. This dress is made from airy open-knit with a light-catching metallic finish that calls to mind the label's silver-tone accessories. It's designed for a slim fit and has pretty patterns highlighting the waist and hem.

products.name: Flavia Platform Sandal Silver Platinum
products.brandedName: Veronica Beard Flavia Platform Sandal Silver Platinum
products.description: With dainty braided and smooth straps that knot at the vamp, our Flavia is the understated statement shoe you've been looking for. Their platform footbed and slim block heel are ideal for grass-covered outdoor gatherings and provide comfort. Both RSVP-ready and everyday, they have an all-occasion versatility-wear them with everything from denim to eveningwear.100% Leather 4 7/8" heel Store in a cool dry place inside dust bag Clean under the supervision of a specialist Style #I7918L5

products.name: Kiernan Striped Dickey Jacket
products.brandedName: Veronica Beard Kiernan Striped Dickey Jacket
products.description: A masterclass in precision tailoring, the Kiernan reimagines classic pinstripes in bold neutrals for the ultimate in versatility. Thoughtfully constructed with a peak lapel, pre-ruched sleeves and an elongated, boyfriend silhouette, this double-breasted design is finished with welt pockets and tortoiseshell buttons. Pair with the Kasa top and Elbe short for a memorable matching-set moment. Pair with a dickey to complete the look.90% Rayon, 10% Polyester Lining: 100% Polyester Professional dry-clean only We recommend that you avoid applying high heat or steam to this garment to preserve the fabric's unique crinkle effect Style #2403ST2310662

products.name: Mia Pleated Wide-Leg Jean
products.brandedName: Veronica Beard Mia Pleated Wide-Leg Jean
products.description: The cool nonchalance of a menswear trouser, the everyday ease of denim. The Mia is a mid-rise, wide-leg jean with a relaxed fit. Pleats at the waist give a tailored feel. Made in LA with premium stretch cotton from Japan, these feature our signature V-shape belt loop at the back and back welt pockets for superior asset management. Pair with anything and everything in your closet. The Mia Jean runs large, we recommend sizing down.92% Cotton 6% Elastomer 2% Elastane Fabric country of origin: Italy Machine wash cold Style #J24027770004EC

products.name: Mick Silk Dress
products.brandedName: Veronica Beard Mick Silk Dress
products.description: With its summer-ready floral print, sheer maxi skirt, and delicate silk-chiffon fabric, our Mick dress showcases feminine style at its best. The romantic piece also features our signature side ruching through the waist and hips for an ultra-flattering fit. Wear with stiletto sandals for a look that takes you from brunch to dinner in style.100% Silk Lining: 97% Elastane, 3% Polyester Professional dry clean only Style #2403GGT012529

products.name: Anabel Puff-Sleeve Top
products.brandedName: Veronica Beard Anabel Puff-Sleeve Top
products.description: A fusion of two of our favorite fabrics-ribbed cotton and stretch-cotton poplin-this Anabel is the best of both worlds. A scoopneck, fitted ribbed bodice meets airy poplin sleeves. Ruching along the shoulder gives subtle volume while cuffed sleeves neaten the look. A great trend-forward, everyday top that can be worn with everything in your closet.97% Pima cotton, 3% Spandex Machine wash cold Style #J2402JY020T0209

This strapless mini dress features self-tie fastenings at the shoulder and a stretch fitted bodice for a flattering silhouette. The adjustable drawstring ties on the sides create a ruched effect, while the cotton skirt and fully lined puffball design exude luxury. Perfect for any occasion, this dress also includes pockets for added convenience. Upper Body: 90% Cotton, 10% Elastane/ Skirt: 100% Cotton Hand wash

Drawstring tie details on either side of the bodice allow you to adjust for a ruched effect and your desired fit. Plus, with a fully lined skirt and classic puff ball effect, you'll feel confident and chic wherever you go. And let's not forget the convenience of pockets for all your essentials! The stretch fitted bodice and full cotton skirt provide a comfortable and flattering fit, while the drawstring tie details on either side create a ruched effect that can be adjusted for a tight or loose fit. Step out in confidence in the fully lined skirt, complete with a classic puff ball effect. Take your style to the next level with its ultra mini length. Ultra mini length.
